name: SidebarComponent

fields.name: componentType
fields.description: Specifies the component type. Valid values are “KnowledgeOne”, “Lookup”, “Milestones”, “RelatedList”, “Topics”, “Files”, and “CaseExperts”.

fields.name: createAction
fields.description: If the component is a lookup field, the name of the quick action used to create a record.

fields.name: enableLinking
fields.description: If the component is a lookup field, lets users associate a record with this field.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height of the component in the container. The unit property determines the unit of measurement, in pixels or percent.

fields.name: knowledgeOneEnable
fields.description: Indicates if the component is enabled for Knowledge One.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The name of the component as it displays to console users. Available for components in a container with the style of tabs or accordion.

fields.name: lookup
fields.description: If the component is a lookup field, the name of the field.

fields.name: page_x
fields.description: If the component is a Visualforce page, the name of the Visualforce page.

fields.name: relatedLists
fields.description: If the component is a related list component, the list of related list names.

fields.name: unit
fields.description: The unit of measurement (pixels or percent) for the height and width of the component in the container.

fields.name: updateAction
fields.description: If the component is a lookup field, the name of the quick action used to update a record.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The width of the component in the container. The unit property determines the unit of measurement, in pixels or percent.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.SidebarComponent.

description: Represents a specific custom console component to display in a
